title: Was Moe Berg a World War II spy?
subtitle: The Washington Senator, Maurice Moe Berg, never made it to the Hall of Celebrity in Baseball, but he was proud to serve his country.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Maurice "Mo" Berg, graduate of Princeton Multilingual University, who played baseball in the main league for the 1920s and 1930s, lived a life of danger and machinations as an American military intelligence officer in Europe during World War II.
